11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_MIXER_AUDIO_MIXER_IMPL_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_MIXER_AUDIO_MIXER_IMPL_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15
16#include <memory>
17#include <vector>
18
19#include "api/array_view.h"
20#include "api/audio/audio_frame.h"
21#include "api/audio/audio_mixer.h"
22#include "api/scoped_refptr.h"
23#include "modules/audio_mixer/frame_combiner.h"
24#include "modules/audio_mixer/output_rate_calculator.h"
25#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
26#include "rtc_base/race_checker.h"
27#include "rtc_base/synchronization/mutex.h"
28#include "rtc_base/thread_annotations.h"
29
30namespace webrtc {
31
32class AudioMixerImpl : public AudioMixer {
33 public:
34 struct SourceStatus;
35
36 // AudioProcessing only accepts 10 ms frames.
37 static const int kFrameDurationInMs = 10;
38
39 static const int kDefaultNumberOfMixedAudioSources = 3;
40
41 static rtc::scoped_refptr<AudioMixerImpl> Create(
42 int max_sources_to_mix = kDefaultNumberOfMixedAudioSources);
43
44 static rtc::scoped_refptr<AudioMixerImpl> Create(
45 std::unique_ptr<OutputRateCalculator> output_rate_calculator,
46 bool use_limiter,
47 int max_sources_to_mix = kDefaultNumberOfMixedAudioSources);
48
49 ~AudioMixerImpl() override;
50
51 // AudioMixer functions
52 bool AddSource(Source* audio_source) override;
53 void RemoveSource(Source* audio_source) override;
54
55 void Mix(size_t number_of_channels,
56 AudioFrame* audio_frame_for_mixing) override
57 RTC_LOCKS_EXCLUDED(mutex_);
58
59 // Returns true if the source was mixed last round. Returns
60 // false and logs an error if the source was never added to the
61 // mixer.
62 bool GetAudioSourceMixabilityStatusForTest(Source* audio_source) const;
63
64 protected:
65 AudioMixerImpl(std::unique_ptr<OutputRateCalculator> output_rate_calculator,
66 bool use_limiter,
67 int max_sources_to_mix);
68
69 private:
70 struct HelperContainers;
71
72 // Compute what audio sources to mix from audio_source_list_. Ramp
73 // in and out. Update mixed status. Mixes up to
74 // kMaximumAmountOfMixedAudioSources audio sources.
75 rtc::ArrayView<AudioFrame* const> GetAudioFromSources(int output_frequency)
76 RTC_EXCLUSIVE_LOCKS_REQUIRED(mutex_);
77
78 // The critical section lock guards audio source insertion and
79 // removal, which can be done from any thread. The race checker
80 // checks that mixing is done sequentially.
81 mutable Mutex mutex_;
82
83 const int max_sources_to_mix_;
84
85 std::unique_ptr<OutputRateCalculator> output_rate_calculator_;
86
87 // List of all audio sources.
88 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<SourceStatus>> audio_source_list_
89 RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
90 const std::unique_ptr<HelperContainers> helper_containers_
91 RTC_GUARDED_BY(mutex_);
92
93 // Component that handles actual adding of audio frames.
94 FrameCombiner frame_combiner_;
95
96 RTC_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(AudioMixerImpl);
97};
98} // namespace webrtc
99
100#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_MIXER_AUDIO_MIXER_IMPL_H_
101
